component.name: Penguin Subtitle Player
component.summary: An open-source, cross-platform standalone subtitle player

description.p: You download the subtitle file (.srt, .ssa, .ass) file from any sites you like and load it into the subtitle player. The subtitle player provides a translucent window which always stays on the top so that subtitles can be shown on top of the video without blocking anything. With Penguin Subtitle Player, just open your favorite online streaming site, load the subtitle file into the player, and enjoy.
